incidents.name: GoTo Connect - PSTN call failures

incident_updates.body:
On 10/13/2022, from 14:54 UTC until 15:02 UTC, a subset of GoTo Connect customers may have experienced outbound & inbound call failures to PSTN destinations. Immediately after the root cause of the issue was discovered, it was promptly fixed.  

We have confirmed that the issue has been resolved completely and all systems are 100% operational at this time.

We will conduct an internal investigation of this issue and make appropriate improvements to our systems to help prevent or minimize future recurrence.

We have confirmed that the issue has been resolved completely and all systems are 100% operational at this time.

We will conduct an internal investigation of this issue and make appropriate improvements to our systems to help prevent or minimize future recurrence.

incidents.name: Goto Contact - Realtime and Analytics Missing

incident_updates.body:
On 05/03/2022, from 02:09 UTC until 17:17 UTC, a subset of GoTo customers might have experienced issues when accessing Contact Center real-time and analytics sections.

In the process of bringing many of our customers the best experience of our new GoTo Contact Center, we unintentionally enabled the new experience early for a subset of our customers. We apologize for the inconvenience, and we have rolled back larger accounts to the previous version for the time being. We have confirmed that the issue has been resolved completely and all systems are 100% operational at this time.

For any Insight Center accounts which were not rolled back and that lost temporarily access to real-time and analytics, your admin will need to assign a Supervisor role and Agent role to take advantage of the new GoTo Contact Complete experience. Learn more on how to assign roles here https://support.goto.com/connect/help/video-how-do-i-assign-agents-and-supervisors-to-queues-in-gotoconnect-3-42

incidents.name: GoToConnect - PSTN Calling and Messaging Impacted

incident_updates.body:
Last week, to varying degrees, a significant portion of GoToConnect customers experienced degraded service, impacting their ability to receive telephone calls to their local telephone numbers as well as their messaging service. 

The issue was caused by an underlying carrier network outage that impacted multiple providers across the telecom industry. 

We have been in close collaboration with that underlying carrier and have been informed that the service has been fully restored, which we have confirmed based on our own monitoring. Please continue to monitor our system status page for updates. 

For more context on this service disruption, please visit: https://blog.logmeininc.com/wide-spread-carrier-network-outage-impacted-multiple-providers-across-the-telecom-industry/

Our engineers have confirmed that our upstream provider has corrected the issue. We are confirming that all services are functional.

For more context on this service disruption, please visit: https://blog.logmeininc.com/wide-spread-carrier-network-outage-impacted-multiple-providers-across-the-telecom-industry/

We will provide a final update shortly.

Our engineers have identified that the active outage from an upstream provider is also affecting our messaging service. We are now actively working on mitigating the impact on our customers.

For more information about the ongoing disruption, please read our blog post at: https://blog.logmeininc.com/wide-spread-carrier-network-outage-impacted-multiple-providers-across-the-telecom-industry/

We will provide further updates shortly.

Our engineers have identified that the issue is related to an active outage from an upstream provider. We are now actively working on mitigating the impact on our customers.

For more information about the ongoing disruption, please read our blog post at: https://blog.logmeininc.com/wide-spread-carrier-network-outage-impacted-multiple-providers-across-the-telecom-industry/

We will provide further updates shortly.

Our engineers have confirmed that our upstream provider has corrected the issue. We are confirming that all services are functional.

For more context on this service disruption, please visit: https://blog.logmeininc.com/wide-spread-carrier-network-outage-impacted-multiple-providers-across-the-telecom-industry/

We will provide a final update shortly.

incidents.name: GoToConnect - PSTN calling impacted

incident_updates.body:
Earlier today, a significant portion of GoToConnect customers experienced degraded service, impacting their ability to receive telephone calls to their local telephone numbers. The issue was again caused by an underlying carrier network outage that impacted multiple providers across the telecom industry.

We have been in close collaboration with that underlying carrier and have been informed that the service has been fully restored as of 02:53 UTC (many customers experienced partial service restoration earlier), which we have confirmed based on our own monitoring.

Please continue to monitor our system status page for updates. For more context on this service disruption, please visit: https://blog.logmeininc.com/wide-spread-carrier-network-outage-impacted-multiple-providers-across-the-telecom-industry/ 
 
We apologize for any disruption in service.

Our engineers have confirmed that our upstream provider has corrected the issue. We are confirming that all services are functional. 

For more context on this service disruption, please visit: https://blog.logmeininc.com/wide-spread-carrier-network-outage-impacted-multiple-providers-across-the-telecom-industry/

incidents.name: GoToConnect - PSTN calling.

incident_updates.body:
Earlier today, a significant portion of GoToConnect customers experienced degraded service, impacting their ability to receive telephone calls to their local telephone numbers. The issue was caused by an underlying carrier network outage that impacted multiple providers across the telecom industry. 

We have been in close collaboration with that underlying carrier, and have been informed that service has been fully restored as of 23:28 UTC (many customers experienced partial service restoration earlier), which we have confirmed based on our own monitoring. Please continue to monitor our system status page for updates. We apologize for any disruption in service.

Our engineers have confirmed that our upstream provider has corrected the issue. We are confirming that all services are functional. 

We will provide a final update shortly.

Our engineers are still actively working on mitigating the impact for our customers while we are waiting for the upstream provider to resolve their incident.

We will continue to monitor the situation and will provide a final update shortly.

incidents.name: GoToConnect - Dallas data center service degradation

incident_updates.body:
On 08-11-2021, from 15:00 to 15:15 UTC, GoToConnect's Dallas data center has experienced temporary service degradation for customers in the area as well as degraded functionality for some part of the product.

We have confirmed that the issue has been resolved completely and all systems are 100% operational at this time.

We will conduct an internal investigation of this issue and make appropriate improvements to our systems to help prevent or minimize future recurrence.

incidents.name: GoToConnect - Meeting service Intermittently unavailable

incident_updates.body:
We have confirmed that the issue has been resolved completely and all systems are 100% operational at this time.

We will conduct an internal investigation of this issue and make appropriate improvements to our systems to help prevent or minimize future recurrence.

Our engineers have implemented an alternate fix and we are confirming that all services are functional.

We will continue to monitor the situation and will provide a final update shortly.

We will continue to monitor the situation and will provide a final update shortly.

This issue has been identified to have been caused due to a third-party dependency and we are working on alternate solutions.

We will provide another update shortly.

We are actively investigating reports that some customers may be experiencing issues when trying to access the Meetings service on GoToConnect.

Our engineers are working to resolve the issue and will provide another update shortly.

This issue is limited to Connect Bundle Pro users. There is no known impact to other product functionalities.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and will send another update soon.
